Great response time, staff was on time and got the job done pretty quickly. House looked great when they finished.
Rebecca Hawland
Client
We’ve used several cleaning companies over the years, none have matched Qleen’s attention to detail and customer service.
Rondae Burrows
Client
They handled our move-out cleaning so well, the landlord asked for their number. Everything was spotless—worth every penny.
Jason Roberts
Client
I’m truly impressed, my place has never looked this clean. A spotless transformation, it’s like magic in every corner!
Brian Jackson
